name: SubShark
description:
Subshark is a simple 2d game about avoiding sharks and racking up points, this game was started for the weekly game jam 213 but develepment will be continued after the jam.  Download the game to save your highscore between sessions.

Controls
  • W A S D or ARROW KEYS to move the sub
  • CLICK on buttons to navigate the menus 
  • ESCAPE pauses the game
Credits
  • Made with godot 3.3, aseprite and chrome music lab
  • Shark spawning and fonts from a Plugworld tutorial
  • Made for the weekly game jam 213
